rmaven 0.1.0
  • Reference

    Resolve the classpath for an artifact

    resolve_dependencies.Rd

    This calculates the dependencies for an artifact which may be specified either as a set of maven coordinates (in which case the artifact is downloaded) or as a path to a jar file containing a pom.xml (e.g. a compiled jar file, a compiled jar-with-dependencies, or a assembled src jar) The resulting file paths which will be in the maven local cache are checked on the filesystem.

    resolve_dependencies(
  groupId = NULL,
  artifactId = NULL,
  version = NULL,
  coordinates = NULL,
  path = NULL,
  include_self = NULL,
  nocache = FALSE,
  verbose = c("normal", "quiet", "debug"),
  ...
)

    Arguments

    groupId

    the maven groupId, optional (either groupId,artifactId and version must be specified, or coordinates)

    artifactId

    the maven artifactId, optional (either groupId,artifactId and version must be specified, or coordinates)

    version

    the maven version, optional (either groupId,artifactId and version must be specified, or coordinates)

    coordinates

    the maven coordinates, optional (either groupId,artifactId and version must be specified, or coordinates)

    path

    the path to the source directory, pom file or jar file

    include_self

    do you want include this path in the classpath. optional, if missing the path will be included if it is a regular jar, or a fat jar, otherwise not.

    nocache

    do not used cached version, by default we use a cached version of the classpath unless the pom.xml is newer that the cached classpath.

    verbose

    how much output from maven, one of "normal", "quiet", "debug"

    ...

    passed on to as.coordinates()

    Value

    a character vector of the classpath jar files (including the current one if appropriate)

    Examples

    
resolve_dependencies(groupId = "commons-io", artifactId = "commons-io", version="2.11.0")
#> executing: /home/runner/.cache/rmaven/mvnw dependency:build-classpath -Dmdep.outputFile=classpath.txt -DincludeScope=runtime
#> [1] "/home/runner/.m2/repository/commons-io/commons-io/2.11.0/commons-io-2.11.0.jar"

resolve_dependencies("org.junit.jupiter","junit-jupiter-api","5.9.0")
#> executing: /home/runner/.cache/rmaven/mvnw dependency:build-classpath -Dmdep.outputFile=classpath.txt -DincludeScope=runtime
#> [1] "/home/runner/.m2/repository/org/junit/jupiter/junit-jupiter-api/5.9.0/junit-jupiter-api-5.9.0.jar"           
#> [2] "/home/runner/.m2/repository/org/opentest4j/opentest4j/1.2.0/opentest4j-1.2.0.jar"                            
#> [3] "/home/runner/.m2/repository/org/junit/platform/junit-platform-commons/1.9.0/junit-platform-commons-1.9.0.jar"
#> [4] "/home/runner/.m2/repository/org/apiguardian/apiguardian-api/1.1.2/apiguardian-api-1.1.2.jar"                 

resolve_dependencies(
  path="/home/terminological/Git/rmaven/inst/testdata/test-project-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar")
#> Error in utils::unzip(jar_path, list = TRUE): zip file '/home/terminological/Git/rmaven/inst/testdata/test-project-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar' cannot be opened

resolve_dependencies(
  path="/home/terminological/Git/rmaven/inst/testdata/test-project-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT-src.jar")
#> Error in utils::unzip(jar_path, list = TRUE): zip file '/home/terminological/Git/rmaven/inst/testdata/test-project-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT-src.jar' cannot be opened
